Serialized Form

  • Package core

    • Class core.StyledButton

      class StyledButton extends JButton implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • pos
          Point pos
          This variable represents the position of the button inside the gird. If pos is null no information is available
        • pressed
          boolean pressed
          This variable indicates if the button is pressed or not

    • Class core.StyledLabel

      class StyledLabel extends JLabel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • pos
          Point pos
          This variable represents the position of the label inside the grid. If pos is null no information is available
        • staticText
          String staticText
          This string represents the part of the label text that can not change
        • variableText
          String variableText
          This string represents the part of the label text that can change

  • Package ui

    • Class ui.BoardComponent

      class BoardComponent extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blocks
          ArrayList<Block> blocks
          Reference of the block list of the parent board
        • listener
          BlockMoveListener listener
          Listener used to tell the board when the user made an interaction

    • Class ui.DashboardComponent

      class DashboardComponent extends JPanel implements Serializable

    • Class ui.PageCounter

      class PageCounter extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • activeDotSize
          int activeDotSize
          The dimension of one dot when active
        • currentPage
          int currentPage
          The number of the dot currently highlighted. Count starts from 1
        • dotGap
          int dotGap
          The distance between dots
        • dotSize
          int dotSize
          The dimension of one dot when inactive
        • totalPages
          int totalPages
          The number of dots in the counter

  • Package ui.dialogs

    • Class ui.dialogs.DbErrorDialog

      class DbErrorDialog extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • errorMsg
          String errorMsg
          The message to be displayed

    • Class ui.dialogs.LevelSelectorDialog

      class LevelSelectorDialog extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • buttonsPerPage
          int buttonsPerPage
          The number of buttons per page, calculated with values from Constants
          See Also:
          • Constants
        • currentPage
          int currentPage
          The number of the page currently shown
        • levelSelectorDialog
          JDialog levelSelectorDialog
          The actual dialog instance
        • levelWrapperPanel
          JPanel levelWrapperPanel
          The layout portion that contains all the buttons for the levels
        • pageCounter
          PageCounter pageCounter
          The indicator of the page currently shown
        • selectedLevel
          int selectedLevel
          The number of the level the user selected
        • totalPages
          int totalPages
          The number of pages, calculated with values from Constants
          See Also:
          • Constants

    • Class ui.dialogs.PostGameDialog

      class PostGameDialog extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • buttonWrapperPanel
          JPanel buttonWrapperPanel
          The layout portion that contains all the buttons
        • labelSubTitle
          JLabel labelSubTitle
          The smaller text that is displayed under the other one
        • labelTitle
          JLabel labelTitle
          The big text that is displayed
        • listener
          PostGameActionsListener listener
          The listener needed to send back to the dashboard all the actions of the buttons
        • moves
          int moves
          The number of moves the player made to win
        • par
          int par
          The minimum number of moves needed to win the current level
